channel.title: Change combat level?
channel.description:
hello. i just got a new source. and wonder how i add so i can change my own combat level?
to like all skills 99 and cb lvl 40 or something?

item.title: Change combat level?
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

you could make a command to do like ::combatlvl 40… if its not added to your source already i’ll make up the code for the command for you… but even if you do change it to 40combat. you will have to reset it to 40 everytime on login. because you refresh your account and it starts over at 126 the normal level it should be… so i’ll see what i can do for you

Read full topic

item.title: Change combat level?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

He wants to be level 99 in the skills but only level 40 combat. I suggest changing the int combatLevel = 0; (or whatever your source as) to a minus number so when you are level 99 in all skills it calculates it to be 126 minus whatever you set the int to.

If that is too complicated it’s best not to ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Change combat level?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

From my experience of Private Servers,

After you’ve made yourself an Admin (Gold Crown) You can type ::max
Or
You can go into the Character files, find your name (If you’re the very first person to log onto this server there will only be your file in there)
After you’ve changed the stats from whatever level to 99, LOGOUT save the file, then log back in.
This should give you all stats 99.

Read full topic
